prompts: Create a bipedal fire-type Pokemon with striking orange fur and agile limbs.
I want a Pokemon that embodies speed and agility, featuring fiery accents.
Generate an energetic fire Pokemon with a competitive spirit and a sleek design.
Make a vibrant fire-type Pokemon that excels in urban environments and sports.
Imagine a unique Pokemon with bold orange and white colors, ready for battle.
Design a sporty fire-type Pokemon that can leap high and run fast.
Give me a dynamic fire Pokemon that combines athleticism with fiery abilities.
